title: See George and Barbara Bush's emotional coin toss at Super Bowl Ll
text: Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email See George and Barbara Bush's emotional coin toss at Super Bowl Ll President George H.W. Bush looks on during the coin toss prior to Super Bowl 51 between the Atlanta Falcons and the New England Patriots in Houston, Tx. Post to Facebook See George and Barbara Bush's emotional coin toss at Super Bowl Ll President George H.W. Bush looks on during the coin toss prior to Super Bowl 51 between the Atlanta Falcons and the New England Patriots in Houston, Tx. Join the Nation's Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs See George and Barbara Bush's emotional coin toss at Super Bowl Ll None President George H.W. Bush looks on during the coin toss prior to Super Bowl 51 between the Atlanta Falcons and the New England Patriots in Houston, Tx. Al Bello, Getty Images Bush tosses the coin along with Barbara. David J. Phillip, AP George H.W. Bush and Barbara, move toward the field for the coin toss. Tim Donnelly, AP Bush is helped to midfield for the coin toss. Jamie Squire, Getty Images Bush and Barbara Bush look on during the coin toss. Ezra Shaw, Getty Images George H.W. Bush and Barbara look shake the hands of players after the coin toss. Al Bello, Getty Images Bush shakes the hand of New England Patriots free safety Devin McCourty. Al Bello, Getty Images Bush shakes hands with referee Carl Cheffers before the doing toss. Richard Mackson, USA TODAY Sports Like this topic? You may also like these photo galleries: Replay
